parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time for F0 frequencies in normal mode

parameters.name: BP2_RE_N_F0
parameters.description: All the real part of the 5x5 calibrated matrices for all bins of F0 sampling frequency in normal mode in the SCM B1-B2-B3 axis system frame [no plot]

parameters.name: BP2_IM_N_F0
parameters.description: All the imaginary part of the 5x5 calibrated matrices for all bins of F0 sampling frequency in normal mode in the SCM B1-B2-B3 axis system frame [no plot]

parameters.name: BP2_RE_N_F0_SRF
parameters.description: All the real part of the 5x5 calibrated matrices for all bins of F0 sampling frequency in normal mode in spacecraft reference frame (SRF) [no plot]

parameters.name: BP2_IM_N_F0_SRF
parameters.description: All the imaginary part of the 5x5 calibrated matrices for all bins of F0 sampling frequency in normal mode in SRF [no plot]
